We can write regular text.

We can write *italic text* or _italic text_.

We can write **bold text** or __bold text__.

We can write ^superscript^ text.

We can ~~strike through~~ text.

We can specify links: [The Data Mine](https://datamine.purdue.edu).

We can [*combine* ~~two~~ **all** of the above](https://datamine.purdue.edu)^wow^.

You can create a nice horizontal rule for content separation:

***

You can include local images: ![](./touch-icon.png).

You can include images from webpages: ![](https://datamine.purdue.edu/graphics/data-mine_icon.png).

You can use LaTeX: $E = mc^2$.

> You can write block quotes

You can have unordered lists:

- item 1
  + sub-item 1
- item 2
  + sub-item 1
  + sub-item 2

You can have ordered lists:

1. item 1
  + sub-item 1
2. item 2
  + sub-item 1
  + sub-item 2

You can even create tables:

First | Second | Third
------|--------|------
1 | 2 | 3
